data.description: Calculate checksums like POSIX cksum program
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The distinction between String::CRC* and this module is, the other
    modules do not calculate a checksum identically to the cksum
    program.

    This module allows programmers to calculate checksums on the fly
    which can be verified at the receiving end using just the cksum
    program; alternatively, programmers can use this module to verify
    checksums which have been supplied from the cksum program.
